column4: 64bit isn't as bad as people claim if your hardware is reasonably common
unfortunately, laptops have a bad tendancy to have custom hardware which isn't "common"
still, trying it out on a livecd shouldn't hurt
yeah i agree as long as you stay native....i'm pulling my hairs out trying to figure out why wine+civ5 won't work right on this 64b 10.10 ...works great on my other (10.04) machine
